alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Franklin; Kearney; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 7:12PM CDT until July 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clay County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Webster County in south central Nebraska... Adams County in south central Nebraska... Kearney County in south central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 712 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hildreth to near Bladen to near Rosemont, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hastings, Minden, Blue Hill, Clay Center, Juniata, Axtell, Fairfield, Hildreth, Campbell, Glenvil, Lawrence, Bladen, Roseland, Holstein, Upland, Ayr, Heartwell, Deweese, Norman and Cowles. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clay; Franklin; Kearney; Nuckolls; Webster
